ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We would have seized him by force,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We would have seized him by his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We would surely have seized him by the right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We would have caught hold of him by his right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We would have definitely taken revenge from him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We surely would have seized him by his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We would certainly have seized him by the right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We would have seized him by the right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We assuredly had taken him by the right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We would indeed have seized him by his right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: We surely had lain hold of him by the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We would have surely seized him by the right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We should certainly seize him by his right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We surely should have seized him by his right hand (or with power and might),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We would have seized him by the right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We would have seized him by the right arm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: We would have seized him by the right hand;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:45] We would have assuredly seized him, We would have exacted vengeance [against him], as punishment, by the Right Hand, by [Our] strength and power;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We assuredly had taken him) We assuredly had taken revenge against him (by the right hand) by means of truth and proofs; it is also said this means: We assuredly had vehemently taken him.
